author: WebDawg@hackspherelabs.com
title: thanks
text:
too many sites post so much text to explain so little.

Like the format of this post.

author: Raúl Salinas-Monteagudo
title: Using snapshots instead of copying the vanilla image
text:
Actually you do not need to copy the image for later reuse. it is faster and more space-efficient to make a snapshot. 

http://wiki.qemu.org/Documentation/CreateSnapshot

author: Kit (Guest)
title: Good instruction
text: Keep it up. I enjoy working with your instruction....
